# **WORSHOP OBJECTIVES**

The conduct of this workshop aims to:

![](images/clipboard-948969627.png)

# **CONTENT OVERVIEW**

-   Discussion on the steps of ARSRL SaTScan and Whole Genome Sequencing enhanced outbreak investigation protocol.

-   Discussion on the role of WGS in public health and outbreak investigation.

-   Discussion on the overview of the following digital epidemiology tools: Epicollect5, Pathogenwatch and Microreact.

-   Hands-on activities on the use of Epicollect5, Pathogenwatch and Microreact.

# **LEARNING OUTCOMES**

After this workshop, the participants are expected to:

![](images/clipboard-3384340523.png)

# **ASSESSMENT OF LEARNING OUTCOMES**

A written pre-test and post-test shall be administered before and after the training. All participants will be provided with a worksheet that will include formative assessment activities for each of the five learning outcomes of the workshop.
